feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model
feed.subtitle: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITIES OF Purchase order item pricing elements (conditions)
entry.content:
Hi Team,

  I have to update the Purchase order item pricing conditions of PMPO and ZDL1 to ZDL4 ( discount level in a bulk through RAP ABAP. I am using this statement by collecting all PO items pricing conditions in  lt_update1 and updating. But this statement is not updating for multiple POs but updates for single PO. Could you please provide your suggestions .
MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_purchaseordertp_2
ENTITY purorderitempricingelement
UPDATE FROM lt_update1
FAILED DATA(ls_failed1)
MAPPED DATA(ls_mapped)
REPORTED DATA(ls_reported1).

Could you please clarify below queries.

1. Please let me know if failed records of all Purchase orders will be collected in 'FAILED DATA'. 

2. Will the successful purchase order update will be rolled back if any one of the purchase order has any errors i,e will we able to update all POs only if there is no error POs?

Thanks & Regards,

Rajeswari

entry.title: Flexible Programming Model show RAP Actions in footer? Is it possible?
entry.content:
Hey dear reader,

I have a FPM App with custom page with XML View and I would like to show the RAP Actions in a footer bar.
Something like a building block for actions.

I am able to show the buttons in the footer from a Fiori Elements Page or standard Object Page from the FPM with the same oData, but in my Custom Page I do not want to re-implement the whole parameter dialogs and call functions, rather then I would re-use this from the RAP framework.

Appreciate any help.

SAPUI5

entry.title: SAP ABAP RAP - Missing value on UI after data created
entry.content:
Dear All,

I encounter an issue where my RAP Application does not return value on UI after created.

The scenario I follow is using /DMO/travel and /DMO/booking (One Travel can have multiple booking)

For example i choose travel number 4136, then i want to create another item booking. I fill the data here then i click save.

After click save, UI not return the data i have just filled, only the price value show up:

 

I am using unmanaged RAP, not sure what is wrong. I do check at Method cba_booking here, this should do the job to return the value to UI.

Appreciate your help and answer.

Thanks.

entry.title: Scalar functions on CDS views
entry.content:
I have created and defined a scalar function called ZWBS_Description.

When implementing the function in the method returnWbsDescription in the corresponding amdp class, the method configuration that provides the result is already set ( in the scalar function definition and implementation reference).

I now would like to create the return value for my scalar function.
(The datasource, is a cds view entity ( based on an SAP table).)

My issue is, that I can't make a select on a CDS view. I get the following error.

In a table function the client dependency can be controlled, but I don't think that is possible for a scalar function. ( The annotation is not allowed. Makes sense, as the client field is always set in a CDS view in the background.)

I have taken a deep dive in the documentation
ABAP CDS - Scalar Functions | ABAP Keyword Documentation
but I can't find any solution regarding that.

My question is now, is it even possible to use a CDS view as a data source?
And on top of that, why (again) are we limited to SQLScript instead if ABAP SQL ?


More background information

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team,
entry.content:
Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team/ ABAP TEAM,

I’m currently using the SAP BTP ABAP Environment trial (User ID: GE202076), and I’m facing persistent activation issues with a CDS view.

I’ve followed all RAP and CDS conventions using `define root view entity` based on the recommended replacement entity `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC`.

However, every attempt to activate the CDS fails with errors like:

- The column BUSINESSUSER is unknown

- The column EMAILADDRESS is unknown

- The column ISLOCKED is unknown

- The column LOGONNAME is unknown

I’ve also tried switching to fields like `firstname`, `lastname`, `emailaddress`, and `businesspartner`, but the activation consistently fails—even in newly created CDS views with correct templates and package setup.

I’ve followed every clean step using Eclipse ADT, project `TDI_EN`, and package `ZGE202076A`, and validated field names via `Ctrl + Space` in the Outline view.

Could you please help me:

  1. Confirm the available fields in `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC` in my trial tenant 
  2. Identify whether this is a metadata replication/cache issue 
  3. Suggest if another CDS (like `I_EMPLOYEESIMPLE` or similar) should be used instead

Looking forward to your guidance.

Thanks

Best regards, 

**Madhulatha Pelluri**

entry.content:
Hi @Andre_Fischer 

Is there a roadmap to support the creation of a draft BO using custom entities?

entry.title: additionalBinding in @Consumption.valueHelpDefinition dont work
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

I have implemented a serch help which schould set thre fields. The definition look like this:

 : {
           lineItem:       [  { position: 30 } ],
           identification: [  { position: 30 } ] }
       
  CodeGroup;
   : {
           lineItem:       [  { position: 40 } ],
           identification: [  { position: 40 } ] }
   @Consumption.valueHelpDefinition: [{ entity: { name: 'zi_zpm_lorcap_code_sh', element: 'code'  } ,
                                        additionalBinding: [{ localElement: 'Codegroup', element: 'Codegruppe', usage: #RESULT },
                                                            { localElement: 'Text', element: 'Text', usage: #RESULT}]}]          
  Code;
   : {
           lineItem:       [  { position: 50 } ],
           identification: [  { position: 50 } ]}
  Text;

The SH definition ist very simple:

@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'LORCAP: Valuehelp für Codes'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
define view entity zi_zpm_lorcap_code_sh
  as select from qpcd
    join         qpct on  qpcd.katalogart = qpct.katalogart
                      and qpcd.codegruppe = qpct.codegruppe
                      and qpcd.code       = qpct.code
{
  key qpcd.codegruppe,
  key qpcd.code,
      qpct.kurztext as text

} where qpcd.codegruppe = 'LOR-CAP' and qpct.sprache = $session.system_language

unfortunately only the fild whre the Sh is defined ist set - the another both not.

Have anyone an idea what is wrong in my code?

 
thanks in advance,
Regards,
Boguslaw

entry.title: Issue In Error message in Unmanged Implememtation RAP
entry.content:
I have implemented an unmanaged service interface implementation in sap rap. where i have create, update, delete methods in custom class, now i have to handle create operation for multiple inputs from Flori side, where i have loop over entity set and handle all create operation but now i have to handle return message for each entity in entity set that is triggered from frontend, where i have tried it implementing using report method of my entity here , but when i triggered data from frontend , i received response with  sap message for first record only ,  but  i am appending response form backend in report for each call with cid , but it is showing message for only one call , other calls don't have sap message field in response header form sap end.

I have Handled error message in this way but when i try to track the call from front end i am receiving for only one call that is first :

          IF ls_data-message_type = 'S'.
            ls_table_log-guid = <lfs_entity>-brelguid.
            ls_table_log-instid_a = lv_matnr.
            ls_table_log-instid_b = lv_ep_note.
            ls_table_log-maktx =  <lfs_entity>-maktx.
            ls_table_log-typeid_a = 'BUS1001006'.
            ls_table_log-typeid_b = ls_note-objtype.
            ls_table_log-file_name = <lfs_entity>-file_name.
            ls_table_log-lifnr = <lfs_entity>-lifnr.
            ls_table_log-maktx = <lfs_entity>-maktx.
            ls_table_log-matnr = <lfs_entity>-matnr.
            SELECT SINGLE MAX( serial ) FROM zzimg_upload
                     INTO (lv_serial)
                      WHERE matnr = _matnr AND
                            lifnr = @<lfs_entity>-lifnr.
            ls_table_log-serial = lv_serial + 1.
            ls_table_log-status = 'I'.
            APPEND ls_table_log TO lt_table_log.
            MODIFY zzimg_upload FROM ls_table_log.

             APPEND VALUE #( %cid = <lfs_entity>-%cid
              matnr = <lfs_entity>-matnr
              serial = <lfs_entity>-serial )
              TO failed-zzmm_material.

          APPEND VALUE #(
           %cid = <lfs_entity>-%cid
          %msg = new_message_with_text(
                                      severity = if_abap_behv_message=>severity-success text = 'Sucess' )
                          ) TO reported-zzmm_material.

            ls_data-message = 'Uploaded Successfully'.
            ls_data-message_type = 'S'.
            APPEND ls_data TO lt_data.
          ENDIF.
        ELSE.
*          lv_message = 'Please Check Uploaded Properties'.
          ls_data-message = 'Please Check Uploaded Image Properties'.
          ls_data-message_type = 'E'.
          APPEND ls_data TO lt_data.
          APPEND VALUE #(   %cid = <lfs_entity>-%cid
                      %msg = new_message_with_text(
                                      severity = if_abap_behv_message=>severity-error text = 'Please Check Uploaded Image Properties' )
                          ) TO reported-zzmm_material.

        ENDIF.
      ELSE.
        ls_data-message = 'Already Uploaded'.
          ls_data-message_type = 'E'.
          APPEND ls_data TO lt_data.
           APPEND VALUE #(  %cid = <lfs_entity>-%cid
                       %msg = new_message_with_text(
                                      severity = if_abap_behv_message=>severity-error text = 'Already Uploaded' )
                          ) TO reported-zzmm_material.

      ENDIF.

entry.title: Filtering of Sales Order items on action in Manage Sales Orders version 2
entry.content:
Dear All,

 

I've been working on extension of a RAP based application which is Manage Sales Orders version2 to place buttons on items table and show/hide the items based on button press correspondingly. 

I'm able to place buttons by extending the BDEF of a main BO and also projection view of items, I can see the debugger is triggering on action press but i'm not able to hide the items. please suggest on how can i achieve this?

 

Thanks in Advance.!

Ramesh

__PRESENT

entry.title: How to trigger a workflow in a shared environment via CpWf-API/Proxy-API? (SBPA, Process Automation)
entry.content:
Dear experts,

how can a workflow be triggered in a shared environment via CpWf-API/Proxy-API?

Do the requests (Start, Cancel) have to be created/executed manually?
In my opinion, that would be a step backwards.

I would appreciate any tips/information, as the blog post is no longer being updated.
https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-blog-posts/sap-build-process-automation-how-to-transition-to-shared-environment/ba-p/14049650

Best regards
Alexander

entry.title: Edit not possible: locking of entity failed
entry.content:
Hello, I am working on a RAP application with a managed implementation with draft enabled. 

I have two entities: parent and child. 

When in Edit mode,  spamming the 'Create' button of the child entity results in the error 'Edit not possible: locking of entity 'Parent' failed'.

The problem is that after this the child section keeps 'loading' and the whole page kind of breaks because nothing happens after I click on discard draft or when trying to go back.

What can I do in this situation? Is there a way I can catch the error or a way of stopping the user from spamming the create button?

entry.title: Using SAP RAP managed Program, User Manual & File download functionality
entry.content:
Using SAP RAP managed (draft enabled) Program, I have created application for business users to upload the data from CSV file available on desktop(Presentation Server), display it on table in the application. Later on click on create, we update data in backend tables among other things. Its working fine.

Business users want additional feature, that there should be a 'download user manual' & 'Download file template' button on the home page/object page which they can use to download user manual (PDF file) and download template (CSV file) respectively.

How this functionality can be achieved? Please suggest.

I am using S4HANA ON PREMISE - SAP S/4HANA 2023, ABAP PLATFORM 2023.

entry.title: On pressing create button of item table of object page in RAP it's being navigated to new blank page
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I am new to RAP and trying to create a basic fiori app using RAP with draft action.

I have created sales order header and item table, interface view, projection view and metadata extension to display data on list report and object page.

Now when i perform create action i am succefully able to create header data while pressing create button item table navigation is being done to new page with blank screen and apply button in the footer and when i click on apply it automatically navigates to main object page with one line item available in item table.

Now i have below mentioned questions

1) How i can see the fields in blank sub object page which is displayed on create of item table.

2) Why blank screen is shown.

3) How can i achieve - Table row will be added in item table on press on create button.

I have attached the Txt file which contains Metadata and behaviour definition code and Sales header and item cds consumption view along with screenshots.

entry.title: What happened to e-learning and learning journey on RESTful ABAP programming in SAP Learning Hub
entry.content:
Good morning, all.

Logged into my learning hub after a long time. I remember i had book-marked some e-learning tutorial and some learning journeys specifically designed for ABAP RESTful programming model. Once in a while i used to go and refer them for my technical needs.

But now, i don't see them in my saved settings or anywhere in the catalogue. What's changed? why there are no learning journey which covers RESTful programming.

I tried searching with multiple terms...couldn't find any. Can someone help me understand what happened to those tutorials and what do we have now in case if you want similar tutorials.

entry.content: Assuming that my Fiori app is connected to an odata servici. Is it possible to display the returned results of the bapi into the fiori app?

entry.title: How to Hide a Combined Field Group (#AS_FIELDGROUP) by Default in a Fiori Elements List Report
entry.content:
I’m working on a CDS view where we use the #AS_FIELDGROUP annotation to display a combined field called “Planned Start / End”.

 @ui: {
  lineItem: [
  {  hidden: true
  },
      { 
      type: #AS_FIELDGROUP,
        valueQualifier: 'StartEnd',
        label: 'Planned Start / End',
        importance: #LOW
         }
  ],
      fieldGroup: [
      {
      exclude: true,
      qualifier: 'StartEnd',
        position: 10 }]
  }
  @Consumption:{
      filter.hidden: true
       }
       
  MfgOrderPlannedStartEndDate;
    @ui: {
    lineItem: [
    { hidden: true }
    ],
    fieldGroup: [
    {
    qualifier: 'StartEnd',
      position: 20 }] }
  @Consumption:{
    filter.hidden: true
     }
  MfgOrderPlannedEndStartDate;

At the moment, this field is shown by default in the list report, but I’d like it not to appear by default, while still allowing users to add it manually via Adapt UI (table personalization). I tried using exclude: true, but it didn’t work as expected.

Do you know if there’s a way to achieve this behavior? Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Multi-Input field on RAP Based Fiori Elements Object Page items table
